TEXT.TITLE: SYNTHETECH <NZYM> ENDS SOUTHWEST PHOTO TALKS
TEXT.BODY: Synthetech Inc said it discontinued negotiations on acquiring Southwest Photo chem Inc of Pomona, Calif. The company cited "irreconcilable differences" in the financial structure of the deal. It said Southwest Photo proposed a significant change in terms outlined in the letter of intent signed last month. Reuter
